DOC.criteria: Healthy 12monthold toddler ( 0/ +29 day ) complete Study V72P13 Previous ascertain suspected disease cause N. meningitidis ; History severe allergic reaction previous vaccination hypersensitivity vaccine component ; Any serious chronic progressive disease Known suspect impairment/ alteration immune system , Receipt , intent immunize another vaccine , within 30 day prior enrollment .
